activities: Market research organization conducting research projects that involve identifying medical experts in various therapeutic disease categories that help life sciences companies understand who are the category, or scientific, experts.
eucountries: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: First and last name, organization or institution affiliation, medical specialty, location (city, country, province, state, region).  Some of the data collected on market research surveys is manually processed.
privacyprograms: Better Business Bureau Safe Harbor Resolution Dispute Procedure.
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to Rivermark at the address given below.  Rivermark will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure or personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy.  Rivermark has further committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism when necessary.  Rivermark uses the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor program (http://www.bbb.org/us/european-dispute-resolution/) to resolve such disputes.
